  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(String name, float hitPoints, float maxHitPoints)
      Constructor to create a monster. If 0 less than equal to hitpoints less than equal to maxHitPoints then the status should be alive otherwise status should be dead.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the monster
      hitPoints - the current hitpoints of the monster
      maxHitPoints - max hitpoints of monster

    • Monster

      public Monster(Monster other) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Copy constructor for monster. Used to avoid privacy leaks in your Monster class Every time you return a monster you should return a copy not an original.
      Parameters:
      other - The other monster to be copied.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException

      public void heal(float healing) throws InvalidArgumentException

      Parameters:
